scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-node
scripts.coverage: nyc npm run test-node && nyc report
scripts.coveralls: nyc npm run test-node && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.test-browser: npm run prepare-tests && npm i karma-phantomjs-launcher && karma start
scripts.prepare-tests: npm run bundle && npm run bundle-treeshake
scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run build-umd && npm run build-esm
scripts.doc: docco underscore-esm.js && docco modules/*.js -c docco.css -t docs/linked-esm.jst
scripts.weight: npm run bundle && npm run minify-umd | gzip-size | pretty-bytes
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run doc

hooks.pre-commit: npm run bundle && git add underscore.js underscore.js.map underscore-esm.js underscore-esm.js.map
hooks.post-commit: git reset underscore.js underscore.js.map underscore-esm.js underscore-esm.js.map
